## Motor Trend Car Road Tests

```{r message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

mtcars$cyl <- factor(mtcars$cyl)

g <- ggplot(data=mtcars,aes(x=wt,y=mpg,colour=cyl)) +geom_point() + facet_grid(.~cyl)
g <- g + xlab("Weight (1000 lbs)") + ylab("Miles Per Gallon") 
ggplotly(g)
```
